comment_text:
Thank you for the effort of introducing kimchi. FYI, I wanted to mention that this is not the traditional recipe(or not the Korean way). Traditionally, no carrots, and normally spring onion does not mix with seasons(but might depend on family recipes, but this video seems like making kimchi-product, so okay..). We NEVER cut napa cabbage except for 물김치 Mul-kimchi or a few certain types of Kimchi. so if you want to look for a proper Korean kimchi recipe, check this video from 'Maangchi' https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eTucCw1w6Ak&list=PL23F9A1EBC445FABC&index=1

If the recipe is based on the North Korean way, I'm sending apologize 😅
